title: Den.Goda.Viljan.1991.Bille.August.Ingmar.Bergman.MKO.VHSRip.XviD
description:
Bille August - Den goda viljan AKA The Best Intentions (1991)

Year: 1991
Language: Swedish
Directed by: Bille August
Produced by: Ingrid Dahlberg
Written by: Ingmar Bergman
Type: VHSRip

Synopsis
The story of Ingmar Bergman's parents. In 1909, poor theology student Henrik Bergman falls in love with Anna ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â¦kerbloom, the daughter of a rich family in Uppsala. After their wedding Henrik becomes a priest in the north of Sweden. After a few years Anna can't stand living in the rural county with the uncouth people. She returns to Uppsala, Henrik stays in the north.

Awards

The film won the Palme d'Or at the 1992 Cannes Film Festival. Pernilla August won the award for Best Actress at the same festival
